title: Symbolism #2: Arguing Symbolism with Tarkovsky (Stalker, Andrei Rublev, The Mirror, The Sacrifice)
description:
Symbolism is the subject and this time we explore the great Russian filmmaker Andrei Tarkovsky's seeming 'rejection' of the symbolic in his films. Yet when you watch his films you see levitating bodies, men with patches of white hair, rain drops in nearly every film, splotches of white  liquid in water and dogs among the many recurring motifs in his works. It all seems highly symbolic, and it is my contention, contrary to his own statements, that his films represent an even deeper layer of symbolism than we have have met previously. A personal symbolism. 

There are layers of Symbolism. From the basic symbols we call number and letters to the allegories so prominent in oppressed societies and the deep level symbolism of shapes and images and finally the basic symbolic content of nearly everything. In this discussion I start to unravel a few of my own ideas of the realm of the symbolic. Let me know what you think. 

HEY! SUPPORT THIS CHANNEL TODAY. Please consider a monthly contribution through PayPal to receive extra content and to help me from financially crashing here in Georgia. And if you start today you can get 7 hours worth of extra content immediately. 

Click this... https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G9LDYMSPZ5RGG
Watch this video for more about our extra content:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nykTp3TziRY

My other YouTube channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 

The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas: https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 

The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts. 
https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 

And to understand more about life in Georgia check out my Georgian Crossroads channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g

And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 

(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 

Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. Swim against the stream my friends. 
From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream

Byrne


#symbolism #tarkovsky #stalker
